objects.specification: A large flat rectangular floor surface designed for an exhibition space, with a neutral gray matte finish that resembles polished concrete. The floor has subtle texture variation to suggest a high-quality modern trade show environment and provides a non-reflective, even backdrop to highlight displayed vehicles.
A sleek metallic silver wall panel with subtle car-themed accent lines and a smooth finish, providing a high-end backdrop for vehicle displays.

A raised rectangular display platform with sharp, clean edges and a smooth metallic silver finish. The platform is slightly larger than the featured vehicle footprint and stands at a uniform height, creating a prominent stage for showcasing the demo car.

A sleek modern demo car with aerodynamic silhouette, featuring glossy red paint with subtle metallic flakes. It has tinted windows, streamlined LED headlight details, and polished chrome alloy wheels. The vehicle exhibits clean lines and a sculpted body, embodying contemporary automotive design.

A modern reception desk with clean straight lines and minimalistic form, finished in glossy white lacquer. The desk features a smooth flat work surface and concealed storage details beneath, conveying a professional and inviting appearance for visitor check-in.

A contemporary office chair with ergonomic design, featuring black leather upholstery and a chrome-plated metal frame. It has a supportive backrest, adjustable height mechanism, and a five-point caster base for mobility.

A tall rectangular banner panel with a smooth, rigid surface and high-resolution printed branding graphics. The design showcases vibrant automotive logos and imagery, with a matte protective coating to prevent glare under exhibit lighting.
